channel.title: Blog on TIBA
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on TIBA

item.title: TIBA AMA Recap #1 - Conflux
item.description: On the 7th of August, TIBA kicked off its new AMA series. We are going to host regular ask me anything sessions with fascinating blockchain projects from China and around the world. We’d like to give the international community direct access to these projects and a chance to ask whatever you’re interested in. Scan the QR code below to get invited to the TIBA #AMA WeChat group and find out more!
